ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Digest Number 159
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, its nothing but spam. If you can just block the persons address, it will not block the whole list. ... From: Gibson, Sara M To:
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, its nothing but spam. If you can just block the persons address, it will not block the whole list.
----- Original Message -----
From: Gibson, Sara M
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, March 12, 2003 3:04 PM
Subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] Digest Number 159


I am thinking that more than likely someone has joined this group (as I
have seen in other groups) merely to post things like this. This is not
the fault of the list owner, but of someone who is abusing Yahoo! rules.




-----Original Message-----
From: Tommy Bolle [mailto:mrbeartb@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 12, 2003 3:02 PM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] Digest Number 159



Yes if you send more stuff like this i will leave, i
was checking my mail at school. and i get this. please
do not send anything of this kind again. or i will
also unsubscribe!!!

>
> If this group is going to allow garbage like this I
> want no part of it. Please unsubscribe me.
